ClassDef.Name: UIImage

Properties.Name: Image
Properties.Description: The image asset used for the image.

Properties.Name: Color
Properties.Description: The color applied to the image.

Properties.Name: StretchMode
Properties.Description: Determines how the image is stretched within the view.

Properties.Name: Loading
Properties.Description: Indicates whether the image is currently loading.

ClassDef.Description: UIImage is a class that can be used to display images.
